HateSpeech_2.0.TEXT:
"the apple ceo guy is gay. No wonder the new iphone 6 bends.faggot. #stevejobsdidntdieforthis"
"#hatefact #2. Blacks are overrepresented in support and admin roles, which is why the military is an inefficient, ineffective mess."
"The difference between a coon and a 9 inch pizza......A pizza will feed a family of four!"
"Good deeds will conquer bad people & light will banish shade - white people are hurting we should decide our own cure...death to the enemy"
"@StephenNolan @audioBoom Homosexuality is vile, repugnant, repulsive, immoral, unnatural, evil, sinful etc as is alcoholism & drug addiction"
"Black \"activists\" destroy millions of $ in property, shut down cities, over incidents later found legally justified. #OregonUnderAttack"
"Blacks can't be turned into responsible inheritors or contributors. They can only be undeserving beneficiaries of Western civilization."
"#MizzouFootballStrike Could white taxpayers possibly cuck themselves any more? We pay for all these entitled fucks from cradle to grave."
"Blacks will never incline toward Anglo-Saxon concepts of property, rights, liberty, or self-government. They lack tradition and experience."
"Because as we all know, gay people aren't actually people because they're immoral CAUSE THE BIBLE OMMMMMGGGGG"
